conversion_verification.notes: True 3D isometric cutaway transformation successfully performed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry and depth. The cutaway effectively exposes all interior spaces with clear plane separation.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity in room adjacency and wall placement. Balconies and external deck are correctly translated into 3D space.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate to the source plan, including bathroom fixtures and kitchen cabinetry.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Textures are simplified but consistent. No UI contamination or text artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of window frame details compared to architectural icons.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that meticulously translates the source floor plan into a clean isometric model.
